sentences.sContent: What do you want for your birthday?
She’d always wanted to go to Thailand.
I don’t want Linda to hear about this.
sentences.sCn: 我不想让琳达听到这事。

sentences.sContent: He didn’t want the holiday to end.
You can order whatever you want.
This shampoo is mild enough to use every day if you want.
sentences.sCn: 这种洗发液很温和，你想天天用都可以。

sentences.sContent: If she doesn’t get what she wants, she’s not happy.
sentences.sCn: 她要是得不到想要的就不开心。

sentences.sContent: He wanted that job so badly he was willing to kill for it.
sentences.sCn: 他非常想得到那份工作，哪怕要为此去杀人他都愿意。

sentences.sContent: What I want to know is when we’re going to get paid.
sentences.sCn: 我想知道的是我们何时能拿到报酬。

sentences.sContent: All I want is the chance to prove myself.
sentences.sCn: 我只想有个机会证明自己。

sentences.sContent: Oh thank you, it’s just what I’ve always wanted.
sentences.sCn: 啊，谢谢你，这正是我一直想要的。

phrases.pCn: 你想要什么；你想怎么样
无论你要什么；不管你想要什么
试一试；想试试，想要试一试

words.tran: 欠缺的；不足的；不够格的

trans.tranOther: to have a desire for something
